definition: name/noun (part of speech)/place (e.g. among winners)/famous/classifier for people
mouth/classifier for things with mouths (people, domestic animals, cannons, wells etc)/classifier for bites or mouthfuls
to sign up/to enter one's name/to apply/to register/to enroll/to enlist
name (of a person or thing)/CL:個|个[ge4]
to sign (one's name with a pen etc)/to autograph/signature

sentences.english: Security officials rushed down the main aisle to detain the woman.
sentences.chinese: 安全官员立马冲进主通道，扣留了该名女子。

sentences.english: I will praise God's name in song and glorify him with thanksgiving.
sentences.chinese: 我要以诗歌赞美神的名，以感谢称他为大。

sentences.english: And hast borne, and hast patience, and for my name's sake hast laboured, and hast not fainted.
sentences.chinese: 你也能忍耐，曾为我的名劳苦，并不乏倦。

sentences.english: This year we had twenty-seven young women enter.
sentences.chinese: 今年我们有27名年轻女性新加入。

sentences.english: In Gambia 11 journalists have been jailed for extended periods in 2006.
sentences.chinese: 在冈比亚，11名记者在2006年被判长期徒刑。

sentences.english: MOSE is a play on the Italian name for Moses.
sentences.chinese: 摩西这个字是取自义大利人名摩西而来。

sentences.english: The children of Hariph, an hundred and twelve.
sentences.chinese: 哈拉的子孙一百一十二名。

sentences.english: Sometimes, there are over 1000 Africans attending mass.
sentences.chinese: 有时侯，会有超过1000名非洲人参加弥撒。

sentences.english: "Menelaus" is that a good Jewish name?
I even didn't know where it is.
sentences.chinese: 我就莫了个名了，你凭什么认为是我吃的啊？
研究人员对9960名妇女进行了调查。

sentences.english: Israel says it killed at least 20 guerillas in the battle.
sentences.chinese: 以色列说，以军在战斗中至少打死20名游击队员。

sentences.english: This report name must be unique compared with previous reports you have run and archived.
sentences.chinese: 该报表名应该与您以前所运行并存档的报表名不同。

sentences.english: This report name must be unique compared with previous reports you have run and archived.
sentences.chinese: 该报表名应该与您以前所运行并存档的报表名不同。

sentences.english: As for our redeemer, the LORD of hosts is his name, the Holy One of Israel.
sentences.chinese: 我们救赎主的名是万军之耶和华以色列的圣者。

definition: position/location/place/seat/classifier for people (honorific)/classifier for binary bits (e.g. 十六位 16-bit or 2 bytes)/(physics) potential
book or record/registry/roll/place of one's family or ancestral records/membership
to ascertain/to act on/to criticize/to pass on/classifier for batches, lots, military flights/tier (for the ranking of universities and colleges)
the tens place (or column) in the decimal system
common/general/to share/together/total/altogether/abbr. for 共產黨|共产党[Gong4 chan3 dang3], Communist party
seat/base/stand/CL:個|个[ge4]/classifier for buildings, mountains and similar immovable objects
